step_feedback.feedback: While you attempted to extend your arm overhead, the significant movement detected in your elbows and wrists suggests you may not have kept them straight. Focus on maintaining a straight arm throughout the exercise.

The large range of motion in your elbows and wrists indicates that you may need to concentrate on keeping your arm straight and only moving at the shoulder joint.  Try to visualize the fluid pumping from your shoulder.
Your hand opening and closing is good, but the elbow and wrist movement needs more attention.  Try to keep your arm as still as possible, focusing the movement on your shoulder and hand.
Remember to fully open your hand and make a tight fist.  The inconsistent movement in your elbows and wrists suggests you need to focus on isolating the shoulder and hand movements.

exercise_summary: You attempted the overhead pumping exercise, but need to improve keeping your arm straight and focusing movement on the shoulder and hand.  Remember to fully open your hand and make a tight fist while inhaling and exhaling.  Practice focusing on the pumping motion.
